name: Autrotrader UK Clean v1.1 (ad-blocker)
description: This userstyle will block the featured listing that comes up on top and bottom of search results, featured dealers that comes up in the middle of search results, plus a few other ads and unnecessary panels on autotrader.co.uk to keep it just plain and simple.
additional_info:
v1.0 03rd Aug 2014 - release version, all ads blocked
v1.1 03rd Aug 2014 - featured dealers blocked, improved footer
